Cleanuparr/Cleanuparr

Cleans failed downloads for Sonarr and Radarr

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Cleans Radarr and Sonarr libraries based on Plex watch history
  • automates TV show downloads and organizes episodes for usenet and bittorrent users
  • media library cleanup tool for Plex and *arr apps
  • Organizes media libraries without Sonarr or Radarr
  • iOS app for Radarr and Sonarr management
  • Automation scripts for Sonarr, Radarr, Lidarr, Readarr, SABnzbd, and more
  • Mac app for uninstalling applications and cleaning leftover files
  • Automates movie downloads, sorting, and upgrades for your collection
